Sidi Abdel Rahman dị n'ọzara ọdịda anyanwụ Ijipt n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Mediterenian, nwere ọmarịcha osimiri, ọ bụkwa ebe dị mma maka izu ike.
Enwere ọtụtụ ogbunigwe na-agbasaghị, nke sitere na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ n'ógbè ahụ nke kpatara ọnwụ mmadụ ma gbochie mmepe na mpaghara ahụ kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ.

Sidi Abdel Rahman bụ naanị "ebe ezumike dị ala". Gulf of Sidi Abdel Rahman na Mediterenian gụnyere Al Alamein Hotel bụ nke ụlọ ọrụ Egypt General Company for Tourism and Hotels (EGOTH) rere na 2006, Emaar Egypt, onye enyemaka nke Emaar Dubai meriri ikike ịzụlite mpaghara ahụ. A ga-eji ego a natara site na ire ya mee ihe maka ịkwalite ụlọ nkwari akụ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Ijipt, dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka itinye ego Mahmoud Mohieldin si kwuo.

Onye mmepe ahụ, nke nwere nnukwu akpa, onye zụrụ Sidi Abdel Rahman tụrụ aro ịzụlite obodo n'afọ niile na nnukwu ego nke ijeri 1.74. Dị ka o kwere nkwa n'oge ire ere, Emaar wuru nnukwu ebe ezumike a na-akpọ Marassi Resort ozugbo ma ọ dị kilomita 24 ( mi) site na Al Alamain International Airport. DJ Bob Sinclair rụrụ ọrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, 2008 na Marassi. Ihe mbụ Emaar Egypt nyere n'ihu ọha na Egypt na 2015 bụ IPO kachasị ukwuu na Egypt, kemgbe 2007.
